column4: text
Dandelion?
What are you doing here? So far from Novigrad.
Hello Geralt.
I suppose that your presence here is due to another one of your conquests.
Not really...
Yes it's for a lady,
but not for what you think.
You intrigue me Dandelion.
I want to go to a special place not far from here, where I would like you come with me.
I will tell you more when we get there.
Very well, I follow you.
I find you different from usual, and if you ask me to come with you, you must have a good reason.
Indeed Geralt.
Let's go.
You see in the distance, it's Vizima.
Some time ago a smallpox epidemy has raged there.
Yes, I remember.
Sorry but I don't remember.
Here we are.. It's here.
Here what?
Here where rests Essi.
Do you remember Little Eye?
Yes, I remember. Her memory came back to me quite quickly after my amnesia.
I considered Poppet as my little sister.
She was running after life, while death was on her heels.
She was in Vizima at the time of the smallpox epidemic. And it took her away.
I couldn't bring myself to see her burn on the funeral pyres.
So I buried her in this peaceful place, far from the city.
This is very sad news that you are telling me.
I was not able to return to her the feelings she had for me. But it is certain that she affected me.
She did not deserve this tragic fate.
Sorry but I don't remember. I guess it's due to my amnesia.
You met some years ago with Essi, when you and I went to Bremervoord.
She had genuine feelings for you, even though things were different on your end.
The three of us went a little way together, then we separated.
She kept, worn as a lucky talisman, the sky blue pearl that you gave her.
I considered Poppet as my little sister.
She was running after life, while death was on her heels.
She was in Vizima at the time of the smallpox epidemic. And it took her away.
I couldn't bring myself to see her burn on the funeral pyres.
So I buried her in this peaceful place, far from the city.
This is very sad news that you are telling me.
I regret telling that her sky blue pearl would bring her luck.
No Geralt.
She knew your words were a little sacrifice to make her feel better.
And yet it was your sky blue pearl that gave her the courage to face her greatest fear. Because a part of you accompanied her.
Like her lute, she kept it with her until the end. And still carries it on her heart.
Sometimes Essi comes back to life in my dreams, as if nothing had happened.
Thank you Geralt for coming with me.
I didn't have the courage to come alone, and I knew you would pass by. That's why I was waiting for you not far from here.
In these moments, together we are stronger, even if we are no less sad.
It is alone that we mourn, because we are alone when we feel.
I'm going back to Novigrad.
Do you come with me?
Having feelings is not my main strength. Nevertheless, I feel the need to collect myself here longer.
I understand.
If where she is, Poppet sees us. She is most certainly happy to know you are here.
See you soon Geralt.;
MOD questgroup_essidaven Quests
Follow Dandelion
Now Geralt knew of Essi's doom and whereabouts.
I was waiting for Geralt not far from White Orchard. We then headed to a special place...
A Small Tribute to Poppet
